item.description: About me I am a professional software developer. Since the start of my career, I chose to work with systems based on Free and Open Source Software. I have never regretted this choice. The freedoms to use, learn, change and share the code always were important in helping me meet the ever changing needs of myself and others - friends, customers and employers. I am deeply thankful to those who made it possible.

Merit Talk is cheap. Show me the code. Linus Torvalds I have contributed to many public FOSS projects and made some myself. I am Gentoo Linux developer since 2017. I operate an XMPP server since 2015. Contributions to FOSS Gentoo Linux: Developer since October 2017. Brought in and mentored another developer. Contributor since 2015. Linux kernel:
